SEARCH
Package com.vincent.slowfast

Class HappyNumber

java.lang.Object
com.vincent.slowfast.HappyNumber
public class HappyNumber extends Object
LeetCode 202 Easy
Give an integer n, replace the number with the sum of the square of each digit
Repeat the process until:
- the number is equal to 1, which means it is happy number
- the number is in the cycle, which is not a happy number
Constraint:
- 1 <= n <= 2^31-1
